Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What are the main features of ComfyUI-AudioScheduler?
Q&A Data.Answer: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler allows loading MP3 or WAV files, reading the amplitude over time, and previewing the shape of the graph.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What does the LoadAudio node do?
Q&A Data.Answer: The LoadAudio node is responsible for loading audio files from a specified directory, supporting both MP3 and WAV formats.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: How does the AudioToFFTs node process audio data?
Q&A Data.Answer: The AudioToFFTs node performs Fast Fourier Transforms (FFTs) on the audio data to obtain frequency information.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What does the AudioToAmplitudeGraph node create?
Q&A Data.Answer: The AudioToAmplitudeGraph node creates a graph of the amplitude in a specified frequency range for visualization purposes.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What operation does BatchAmplitudeSchedule perform?
Q&A Data.Answer: BatchAmplitudeSchedule is an operation to calculate amplitude values from FFT data based on the specified operation and frequency range.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: How does the ClipAmplitude node work?
Q&A Data.Answer: The ClipAmplitude node clips the amplitude values of audio data by setting maximum and optional minimum allowed amplitude values.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What is the function of TransientAmplitudeBasic?
Q&A Data.Answer: TransientAmplitudeBasic is designed to adjust amplitude data with transient characteristics, controlling attack, hold, and release behavior.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What does NormalizeAmplitude do?
Q&A Data.Answer: NormalizeAmplitude normalizes the amplitude data, optionally inverting the normalized values.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: How does the GateNormalizedAmplitude work?
Q&A Data.Answer: GateNormalizedAmplitude gates the normalized amplitude data based on the specified threshold.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What is the purpose of the NormalizedAmplitudeDrivenString?
Q&A Data.Answer: NormalizedAmplitudeDrivenString is designed to create a dynamic string of text driven by changes in the normalized amplitude of audio signals.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What does NormalizedAmplitudeToNumber convert?
Q&A Data.Answer: NormalizedAmplitudeToNumber converts normalized amplitude data to float or integer values.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What does NormalizedAmplitudeToGraph produce?
Q&A Data.Answer: NormalizedAmplitudeToGraph generates a graph to visualize the normalized amplitude data.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: How does AmplitudeToNumber convert?
Q&A Data.Answer: AmplitudeToNumber converts amplitude data to float or integer values.

Q&A Data.Subject: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
Q&A Data.Question: What does AmplitudeToGraph display?
Q&A Data.Answer: AmplitudeToGraph generates a graph to visualize the amplitude data.
